response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is designed to significantly enhance productivity and efficiency in your operations. Given its unique features and benefits, it's valued at $8,000 by us. Considering its high quality and potential impact on your business, we're extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive introductory price of $7,200. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll find it compelling. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 7200}
